column5: A buddy E-mailed this to me. I wonder if Gerritt, Joe and Bill will help me throw one together when they come up.  FLOATING GAZEBO I was going to build the Gazebo on the edge of my dock down by the lake but I thought ...I might just as well build the deck with floats on it and I can then take it out fishing too. Has 15,000# capacity. The deck is 18ft x 18ft with 12 plastic foam filled dock floats that are 4ft x 4ft by 18 inch. high. and the Gazebo is 10 ft. Hexago n with a table and chairs inside. Under the table is my trolling motor so I can take it out to my favorite fishing hole. The trolling motor is remote controlled wireless so I can be fishing outside and operate the motor. On the top of the table I have a LOWRANCE Fish-Finder with depth sounding sonars and temp gauge. I have 2 electric winches with 40# anchors. I have also built in a water pump so I can clean the fish right on the spot. Now I can relax and fish while my wife can sit and relax.
I've seen that before.  My Brother-in-law says he's going to build one Would be cool.

There is a guy near here that has done something like this with his pontoon boat.  It's got a nice wood railing.  Loaded with a kitchen table and a sofa.  I had to do a double take when I saw it.  Wish I got a picture.  I'll try and find him again this year.
Thats pretty neat. I want one
Wow.  That is wicked.  What an amazing craft to spend time with the family on.
Looks awesome, what do you do with it in the winter?
Well I have the tools and knowledge... lets get building!!!  G
Just remember.. if it has it's own motor it becomes a boat and has to meet all regs. But if you tie your tinny to the side and pull it around with that... it's just a barge.
"Just a couple of hours on a Saturday Bernie!" Let's get 'er done! HH
That's cool, but I looks like it would be a bit of a pain to take out of the water at the end of the season.
Have you seen Bernie move stuff Stan.... No issue for that man ! lol
build it and they will come  and by "they" i mean everbody u know, and some u don't
Can you guys make 2 of them and send one over to me?

Too many other projects to build something like this right now. But maybe in the future....... This summer I am overhauling an old dry boathouse into a sleep cabin....Need it to put Gerritt in. It will be far enough away Joe won't need to listen to  him snore.
I blame the black russian fellow!  G
